objects.name: Analytic 1224
objects.description: Detects execution patterns where a child process is detached from its original parent, often showing up under 'launchd' (PID 1) with no parent lineage. These breakages in the process tree are indicative of evasive techniques using `daemon()`, `fork()` or background execution flags.
